sentences.en: Davies goes into raptures over the brilliantly coloured paintwork.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯深深喜欢上了那幅色彩绚丽的油画作品。

sentences.en: Everyone played brilliantly, but Jones was the hero of the hour.
sentences.cn: 每个人都表现得很精彩,但琼斯无疑是当时的英雄.

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was brilliantly, blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪了几下，接着屋子里豁然大亮，刺得人睁不开眼。

sentences.en: He brilliantly manoeuvred himself back to power.
sentences.cn: 他依靠手腕巧妙地重掌权力。

sentences.en: His acting career started brilliantly, then sank into mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 他的演艺生涯开场时轰轰烈烈，然后就变得庸庸碌碌。

sentences.en: If white light is used, these patterns are brilliantly colored.
sentences.cn: 如果使用白光, 那么这些图形是色彩绚丽的.

sentences.en: In this new book, Harrison brilliantly disentangles complex debates.
sentences.cn: 在这本新作中，哈里森巧妙地理顺了那些纷繁复杂的争论。

sentences.en: It is a very high quality production, brilliantly written and acted.
sentences.cn: 其制作水准很高，剧本和表演都很精彩。

sentences.en: It's extremely hard working together but on the whole it works brilliantly and we're still good friends.
sentences.cn: 一起共事很不容易，但是总体来说我们合作得很成功，我们还是好朋友。

sentences.en: Many of the patterns show brilliantly coloured flowers.
sentences.cn: 许多图案上都有色彩绚丽的花朵。

sentences.en: The kaleidoscopic quality of the book is brilliantly realised on stage.
sentences.cn: 该书包罗万象、精彩纷呈的特质在舞台上得到了精彩再现。

sentences.en: The shops were brilliantly lit up.
The square was brilliantly illuminated throughout the night.
